question:
MIT created a new nanotube structure with the ability to absorb over 99.996% of light. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. Vantablack is the blackest substance ever created.
  2. The MIT material is made of lead.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The new material created by MIT is the blackest substance ever-created. Vantablack held the title previously. It was also produced from the same material. These materials appear so because of their highly efficient absorption of light and very little reflection. Statement 2 is incorrect: The MIT material was created out of carbon in nanotubular form. Nanotubes are layers of carbon- which is about an atom-thick- rolled into tubes. These nanotubes have the ability to trap light photons and reduce the reflection off its surface.
